entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then clearing. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning near midnight. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
